subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: On Monday, the first day that Ryota Igarashi and Hisanori Takahashi reported for workouts, they were curious and amused by many things that they saw and did.
snippet: On Monday, the first day that Ryota Igarashi and Hisanori Takahashi reported for workouts, they were curious and amused by many things that they saw and did.
